title: Peshawar Corps Commander confers military awards on officers, martyrs
content:
RAWALPINDI, Oct 5 (APP): Commander Peshawar Corps, Lieutenant General Nauman Mahmood on Tuesday in an investiture ceremony of Peshawar Corps held at the Corps Headquarters conferred military awards upon next of kins of Shuhada (martyrs) and serving Military Officers for act of gallantry during various operations.
Commander Peshawar Corps, Lieutenant General Nauman Mahmood as Chief Guest conferred 26 Tamgha-e-Basalat, one Sitar-a-e-Imtiaz (Military), and 14 Tamgha-e-Imtiaz (Military) to the next of kins of Shuhada and officers, said an Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) media release received here.
The ceremony was attended by next of kins of Shuhada, senior serving officers of Pakistan Army, and families of the martyrs.
